HiddenText.Name: CE winter quest QA 10
HiddenText.OpenningText: I have health problems, should I attend Quest?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: The Quest Program includes various outdoor activities and classes which are part of the program.  Participants should be able to actively participate in winter activities including cross country skiing while caring gear and winter camping.  If students feel health problems may be a concern, please check with your doctor before committing to participate in Quest.
